attributes.action: Make stricter laws to buy a pet if you have been charged with animal cruelty
attributes.additional_details: We must help make laws stricter on purchasing a pet so we reduce the amount of innocent animals bought to be abused, starved and not looked after properly.
attributes.background: Animals are such loving, caring and beautiful things in the world. Why should they be homed to people who are going to harm them time after time again. We wouldn't let a child go in the property of a pedophile or child abuser so why should these animals be allowed? They have no choice. We must help!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure exactly how you would like the law changed.

You might like to sign this petition, which calls for licences to buy pets, instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258302
